name: Wanted Shadows
description:
Wanted Shadows is Vampire Survivors X Action Gameplay

A bullet heaven/horde survival set in a world where monsters fight over territory. Defeat monsters, power up with permanent upgrades, and become an unstoppable force.

Features

  • SYNERGISE | Build the ultimate loadout by choosing, merging, and upgrading weapons and trinkets.
  • PROGRESS | Use the money obtained from runs to buy new characters, weapons, and permanent equippable powers.
  • MASTER | Master the combat system that allows you to dodge, attack, and decimate your enemies.
  • GRAPHICS | Savour the Octopath Traveler-inspired graphics that mix 2D and 3D.
  • MUSIC | Bless your eardrums with a soundtrack of beautiful handmade melodic RPG tracks.

You'll Like Wanted Shadows if you like

  • Vampire Survivors
  • Brotato
  • 20 Minutes Till Dawn
  • Soul Stalker
  • Spellbook Demonslayers
  • Bio Prototype
  • Peglin
  • Octopath Traveler
  • Risk of Rain
  • Bounty of One
  • Rogue: Genesia
